leaders.name: Guild Leader
leaders.summary: Oversees the vision, culture, and long-term direction of Mōchirīī. Ensures harmony, growth, and clarity across all guild activities.

leaders.name: Vice Leader
leaders.summary: Supports leadership operations, assists with planning, and ensures smooth execution of events and member coordination.

leaders.name: Hall Leader
leaders.summary: Manages specific halls or divisions within the guild, guiding members and maintaining order within their domain.

leaders.name: Dharmapala
leaders.summary: Guardian of guild values, responsible for maintaining balance, respect, and harmony within the community.

leaders.name: Lotus Warden
leaders.summary: Oversees member well-being, assists new arrivals, and helps guide personal development within the guild.

leaders.name: Petal Keeper
leaders.summary: Helps maintain the spirit and atmosphere of the guild, supporting events and community engagement.
